bill.title: Rural water; transfer loan program from Department of Health to DEQ.
bill.description: An Act To Transfer The Administration Of The Local Governments And Rural Water Systems Improvements Revolving Loan And Grant Program From The Mississippi Board Of Health To The Commission On Environmental Quality; To Amend Sections 41-3-15, 49-17-81 And 49-17-83, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; To Create Section 49-17-91 To Authorize The Commission On Environmental Quality To Administer The Program; To Create Section 49-17-93 To Establish The Local Governments And Rural Water Systems Improvements Revolving Loan And Grant Fund; To Repeal Section 41-3-16, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Established The Local Governments And Rural Water Systems Improvements Revolving Loan And Grant Fund Under The Mississippi Board Of Health; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Environment Prot, Cons and Water Res
